SCI

The goal of SCI is to calculate scores for hydrology, water quality, human health, and aquatic biology metrics to assess streams within the District of Columbia.

Installation

You can install the development version of SCI from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("LimnoTech/SCI")

Using the Package

Produce the SCI scores in just a few simple steps:

  1. In RStudio, open the workflow.R script.

  2. Update the “Input Variables” section of the script and confirm the latest data files are saved in the data folder.

  3. Update lookup_tables.xlsx and run code from the “Lookup Tables” section of the script, as needed. Note: this step is not typically necessary.

  4. Click the Source button to run the script.

  5. View the results in all_scores.csv.
